headline: Will HOKA & UGG's Global Surge Propel DECK's Sales Mix Toward 50%?
summary: Deckers' HOKA and UGG are reshaping its global footprint, with international sales rapidly climbing toward 50% of revenues.

raw.headline: Will HOKA & UGG's Global Surge Propel DECK's Sales Mix Toward 50%?

headline: Deckers Outdoor (DECK): Assessing Valuation After New Teva Launches and Continued Earnings Momentum
summary: Deckers Outdoor has been appearing on investor watchlists lately, fueled by a string of upbeat product launches and a proven track record of quarterly revenue and earnings beats. The latest buzz centers on Teva’s Autumn-Winter 2025 collection, which introduces new designs aimed at avid outdoor explorers, along with a headline-making collaboration with creator Sean Wotherspoon. All of this comes as attention builds around Deckers’ ability to keep its brands fresh and relevant in a shifting...
